div.p: The Morphilo Database comprises 15 linked tables. For each time period represented by a corpus of a balanced size compounds, words, suffixes, prefixes, their position and their number can be retrieved. The database is extensible, that is new corpora and its affix information can be added.

The Morphilo Database comprises 15 linked tables. For each time period represented by a corpus of a balanced size compounds, words, suffixes, prefixes, their position and their number can be retrieved. The database is extensible, that is new corpora and its affix information can be added.
